DOC.brief_summary: This study test feasibility health wellness trial design community input . This 12-week program test 24-week period use delayed treatment control group .
DOC.detailed_description: This 12-week program design base input Petersburg , VA community resident , collect various method two-year period . The 12 week program design impact three level : individual , family community . At individual level , participant receive print material lesson relate healthy eat increase physical activity , well videos model lesson ; participant also access peer support coach contact biweekly basis train help identify reach personal health goal . At family level , participant encourage share information receive part program rest family , ask begin walk regularly attend fitness nutrition class hold within neighborhood ( WE program ) family member . On community level , local church group neighborhood organization receive assistance launch walk club , community resident invite attend physical activity nutrition class WE project host within community .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year . Must school go child 1217 living home . BMI 25 50 kg/m2 . report able walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop currently participate another weight loss program take weight loss medication history bariatric surgery pregnant plan become pregnant intervention timeframe report unsupervised heart condition , chest pain period rest activity , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire report medical condition would jeopardize safety involve weight management program diet exercise guideline ( e.g. , uncontrolled heart problem ) fail medical screening study medical staff ) report condition , judgment PI , would render participant unlikely follow study protocol ( e.g. , plan move area , dementia , substance abuse ) .
